hero.title: Manage all your fishery machinery production
hero.description: From request to operation, our platform optimizes the management of fishery machinery, helping you control each stage of the production process efficiently and easily.

descriptions.inventory: Manage your fishery machinery inventory efficiently and easily.
descriptions.invoicing: Create invoices quickly and easily, and keep track of your income and expenses.
descriptions.equipmentMonitoring: Monitor the status of your equipment in real time and receive maintenance notifications.
descriptions.orderingMachine: Request machines quickly and easily, and keep track of your requests.

subscriptions.title: Types of Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: Discover and choose the subscription that best suits you to achieve potential growth in your company

aboutTheProduct.title: Video About the Product
aboutTheProduct.description: We present the main features and benefits of the product in a visual way, facilitating a quick and attractive understanding for users.

aboutTheTeam.title: Meet our Team
aboutTheTeam.description: Dotvue is a startup dedicated to creating production management solutions that help traditional companies optimize their processes, we prioritize the user experience in order to give them a product tailored to be a powerful tool that they can use to perform their tasks more efficiently. In this way we can help them stand out in the market in which they operate.
aboutTheTeam.subtitle: Project Developers

testimonials.title: Listen to what our Customers say
testimonials.description: Discover how we have helped our customers achieve their fishery goals with our solutions.
